## Installation

Install the package using the `install-github.me` service:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
source("https://install-github.me/andrie/TDSP")
```
    
Or using `devtools`:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("andrie/TDSP")
```
